attributes.action: Covid19: Compensate small UK Limited companies with a cash grant of £17,500!
attributes.additional_details:
Just when small companies need urgent cash support during the current Covid19 pandemic & lockdown we are excluded by ridiculous government set eligibility criteria form:
1. £10,000 cash rate grants
2. £7,500 (3x £2,500) furlough employee support grants
3. Covid19 business interruption loans scheme

So the government as a minimum must URGENTLY repeat URGENTLY offer small micro UK Limited companies that have corporation tax filing history but not Paye Payroll with cash grants of *£17,500*.
attributes.background: Compensate small micro UK Limited companies that have corporation tax filing history but not Paye Payroll with a cash grants of *£17,500* for being disqualified by government criteria from receiving the £10,000 rate grants plus the 3 months furloughed employee support of £7,500!

rejection.details:

Coronavirus Support Package for Directors / Shareholders of small Limited Co's: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310515

Extend £10,000 small business grant to SMEs that do not have a property: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304161

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
